title: Where's the specator mode window?
body: On the home page for the LOL client the box with the option to scroll through games to access spectator mode is gone. Is there a way around this or do we just have to wait for Riot to drop their promotional crap? Very annoying

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is more than likely a temporary change, however I do not speak for Riot.

The Featured games list is still able to be pulled down from the API, so it still exists.
